backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor managing posts with create, list, and get functionality using an in‑memory map and auto‑incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing implemented features, associated frontend files, and confidence levels for Plushie Haven.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components, pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind layers and a warm color theme with light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app with ThemeProvider and AgeGate, and renders the main layout.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification component that checks localStorage and requires confirming 18+ before showing the app.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Internet Identity authentication UI providing sign‑in and a user dropdown with sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top‑level layout with header, navigation, auth controls, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile modes and active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines an Article interface and provides sample article data including slugs, metadata, and full text content.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Defines an Event interface and exports a list of upcoming plushie-related meetups, conventions, and workshops.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing and creating posts using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark color palettes and background patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a styled About page describing the community mission, values, offerings, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on slug, showing metadata and parsed content with navigation back to the article list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Renders a grid of article cards using data from articles and links to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Displays community posts, includes a form for authenticated users to create posts, and handles validation and submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens a mailto link and includes a copy-to-clipboard email feature.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows upcoming events in a card grid with date, location, and descriptions from events data.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of static images with titles and descriptions in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section and feature cards linking to articles, community, and other site areas.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s current state, required images, and a list of implemented features for the Plushie Haven website with their versions and descriptions.
